title: critique my flyer
content:
These are going to print. does the background look better lighter or harder? How can the type be a little more exciting?

comp 1:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108115959im_/http:/typophile.com/files/flyer_comp1_3980.jpg)

comp 2:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108115959im_/http:/typophile.com/files/flyer_comp2_4991.jpg)
author: coupdegrace

comments.content:
Light background.

Type exciting? You've got your excitement with BUZZ. I don't think you need to attract readers into two different things. You'r BUZZ is already doing the job. The only thing I find distracting is the lines on B. the joins.
